activities: Personal data is most commonly received by DLS Systems as part of an onward transfer from one of our customers.  We use the information provided to us to maintain normal business relationships and to test and support computer applications.
eucountries: Belgium, France, Germany, Italy, Netherlands, Norway, Spain, United Kingdom
personaldata: Organization, Client and Customer information.  Covered information is currently collected through an onward transfer from our customers.
recoursemech: For complaints that cannot be resolved through our internal process, DLS Systems will participate in the dispute resolution process provided by JAMS (Judicial Arbitration and Mediation Services - www.jamsadr.com).
